snippet: A suicide attack by suspected members of Boko Haram, the Nigerian militant Islamist group, killed at least 10 people over the border in the Far North Region of Cameroon on Saturday, security officials said.
lead_paragraph: A suicide attack by suspected members of Boko Haram, the Nigerian militant Islamist group, killed at least 10 people over the border in the Far North Region of Cameroon on Saturday, security officials said.

headline.main: Suicide Attack Kills at Least 10 in Cameroon
